members: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS members (customer_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name TEXT, join_date TEXT);
menu: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS menu (product_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, product_name TEXT, price INTEGER);
sales: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sales (customer_id TEXT, order_date TEXT, product_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES members (customer_id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES menu (product_id)) ;
